column1: Little Goat Diner////I always bring friends and family here from out of town. It never fails me. I try to order something different everytime and so far all of them are good. Bull's eye french toast
column4: they don't take reservations so better come early though I've never really waited for more than 20 minutes. Service is always excellent. The only problem is parking(applies to all restaurants/bar in randolph)
column5: they have valet though. But if you come on a less busy day you can probably find one.
